110a3('dul ba): med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zes sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
110a4('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // des rgyal po'i khab du bya ba dang / bsgrub pa gang yin pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrub nas bcom
110a5('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag bya te phyogs cig tu 'dug phyog cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
110a6('dul ba): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/ de dag lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi srad gtsug lag khang
110a7('dul ba): rtsig go// bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa/ dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur
110a8('dul ba): snyam na/ dge slong sha ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
110b1('dul ba): 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu cang mi sba bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to// de nas tshe dang ldan
110b2('dul ba): pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan ga ri'i bu de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/
110b3('dul ba): snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyom spyad de/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i
110b4('dul ba): bsod snyom spangs te gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos phab nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod na gang na bder rgyu zhing song ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
110b5('dul ba): sbyin lam brgyags mang po mkhyer nas nub mo nab mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mo tshol nas/
110b6('dul ba): skyed mo tshol dang / nags chal nas nags tshal du 'chags pas 'chag pa na spyod cing 'di skad ces smras so// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang lod nyung zhing kA tsa
110b7('dul ba): nyung ba dang / mtshan mo bcom chung ba dang sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang rlung dang nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i phyogs gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug
110b8('dul ba): lag khang brtsig nas phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon na rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba na mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi nye ba dang nyin par
111a1('dul ba): lang lo nyung zhing kuno nyung ba dang / mtshan mo bcom chung ba dang / swA chung ba dang sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar
111a2('dul ba): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang
111a3('dul ba): na ba der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig
111a4('dul ba): so lags/ des smras pa khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin te skyed mo tshal yin mod kyi de nga yi yin no// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsu
111a5('dul ba): du yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon na bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so//
111a6('dul ba): khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba der gser gyi bye ma gshibs kyang nga mi gtong // 'dul ba bzhi/
111a7('dul ba): yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces sbas so// gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum lags kyis dbyig dang gser bzhes shig/ kun
111a8('dul ba): dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so// rin thang sus bcad khyod kyis rin thang bkum mo// de gnyis rin thang bcad do// rin thang ma bcad do// zhes rtsod par gyur nas/ zhal lde gcod
111b1('dul ba): ba'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig par
111b2('dul ba): brtson gyis/ de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas zhal lce gcod pa'i phyir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ dgos pa'i phyir 'dug go khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / gzhon
111b3('dul ba): na rgyal byed gnyis gzhal lde bcod pa'i sna chen po la btogs pa'i drung du dong nas/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal lces gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs
111b4('dul ba): pa rnams la/ don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis spras pa/ gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long shig/ kun dga' ra ba khyim bdag gi yin//
111b5('dul ba): de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis shing rta dang brgya dang gseb dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang bung bu rnams la gser mang po bka la ste/ 'ongs
111b6('dul ba): nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal thams cad gshib par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs mga' zhig ma g.yos pas ma bkram pa nyid 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
111b7('dul ba): don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gi ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas spang yang sba bar bya ma dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin/
111b8('dul ba): ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de dag gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon na rgyal byed kyis bsams pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i
112a1('dul ba): ched du nor gyis phung po chen po 'di snyed yongs su gtang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad
112a2('dul ba): ces smras so// khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod pa skyes nas gser slar log shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyis yin no// gzhon na bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don
112a3('dul ba): 'di sems shing yud tsam shig cang mi smra bar 'dag pa ni gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang
112a4('dul ba): po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa mo yin zhing / chos bshad pa yang
112a5('dul ba): mchog ma yin te/ de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga'i ra ba'i ched du nor gyis phung po 'di snying yongs su gtong ngo // snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la
112a6('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir sgo gang gcig par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon
112a7('dul ba): med zas sprin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas/ der gzhon na rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsigs du bcug go/ de nas khyim bdag
112a8('dul ba): mgon med zas sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs par brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhes sdang drags pos kun nas spongs pa'i yid can rnams
112b1('dul ba): 'dus nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang sbas pa/ khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig shig/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag
112b2('dul ba): gis grong khyer bgos te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni rgyal po'i khab yin no// kho bo cag gi ni mnyan long yin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyis/ bdag
112b3('dul ba): gis nor ma dgos pas gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyis phung po gcig go/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / yang der khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par
112b4('dul ba): byas pa dang / mu stegs ci rdol tsan mu cor spras pa rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur spyod du mi bzhugs te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyis mchog cig 'ongs
112b5('dul ba): na/ gal te de'i gshegs kyis kho bo cag la pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig/ de spras pa/ rung gis re shig 'phags pa sha ri'i bu la brtag/ de nas khyim bdag mgon
112b6('dul ba): med zas sprin tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang na ba der ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la glo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug
112b7('dul ba): nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod dga' mgur byed du mi
112b8('dul ba): bzhugs ste dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyis mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i gshegs kyis/ kho bo cog pham par gyur na gtsug lag gang gcig shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar
113a1('dul ba): bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus bsams pa/ ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod
113a2('dul ba): bar mthong ngo // su zhig la rag par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o// yang bsams pa ji snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan
113a3('dul ba): gyi tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod pa mthong ngo // dus ji srid kyis tshogs par gyur snyam na zhag bdun lon nas so// bsams nas smras pa khyim bdag de bzhin du byas te/
113a4('dul ba): 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu stegs
113a5('dul ba): can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag 'phags pa sha ri'i bu na re de bzhin du byas te 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis bsams pa//
113a6('dul ba): 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni de bros 'dod do// yang na ni phyogs tshol lo// de ma yin na dus der gang ba ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang phyogs 'tshal lo zhes
113a7('dul ba): de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs 'tshal ba dang / kun tu rgyu dmigs dmar mthong nas de la de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag gi tshangs pa
113a8('dul ba): mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig dus
113b1('dul ba): ji tsam zhig na 'di nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par ro// rung gis de bzhin du byas te/ gang gi tshe khyod cag 'dus par 'gyur ba de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang /
113b2('dul ba): sems khra la skyes nas nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang nyi ma dang bgrang bar byed do// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa
113b3('dul ba): phyogs langs par snyan bshom du bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang / mnyan
113b4('dul ba): yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag da ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskal nas
113b5('dul ba): 'dus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar te/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas gdul ba'i skye bo rnams
113b6('dul ba): la bltas te/ 'dzum mngon du btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/ 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la rtog cing
113b7('dul ba): 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan ci re shig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas khyed
113b8('dul ba): kyis gis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu dmigs dmar gyis lta
115a1('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas/ kun tu rgyu dmig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis byos shig ngas bzhig go do dmig 'phrul byung ba yin pa
115a2('dul ba): des shing sa tsa ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / ce dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phan tshun rnam par gtor to/ rnal 'byor
115a3('dul ba): ba rnam kyi yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad mo'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des kun tu rdal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam
115a4('dul ba): zhig bzhag go/ des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus na mkha' lding zhig sprul te des de blangs so// des ro longs zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan
115a5('dul ba): pa sha ri'i bus bsngags kyi phur pa btab pa las nyes par spyad pa ni/ ro langs ni bdag nyid bsod par byed pas de nyid bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag 'phongs shing
115a6('dul ba): spu zing zhes byed nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ yongasu skyab du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
115a7('dul ba): sha ri'i bus sngags kyi phur ba phyung ba dang / ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de la chos bshad de dad pa skyes nas spras pa/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu bdag leg
115a8('dul ba): bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag 'phags pa sha ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
115b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de rab tu byung bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams ngag byin te des brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang
115b2('dul ba): nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag 'thil du
115b3('dul ba): mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig par tho
115b4('dul ba): pa/ srid pa dang snyed pa dang chags pa dang / bskur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang mdze
115b5('dul ba): bar smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyis mig bgrang nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te/ smras pa 'phags pa sha ri'i bus ni smra ba'i
115b6('dul ba): khyu mchog chen po tshar gcod do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsams pa dang / bag nyal dang /
115b7('dul ba): khams dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par bya'o// de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas
115b8('dul ba): khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
116a1('dul ba): chub tu/ kha cig gis ni sgrubs 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni
116a2('dul ba): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so//
116a3('dul ba): 'khor bal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa dge 'dun la 'bab pa la bkod do// mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag gis 'di gshegs kyis
116a4('dul ba): bcad par mi nus kyi/ thabs shig bshams par byas la de nas rlags rnyed nas/ 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o// snyam nas thams cad 'dus te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
116a5('dul ba): drung du dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gis 'tsho ba'i gnas thams cad ni bcad pas de bas na snying rtse bar bgyis shig dang / khyod kyis gtsug lag khrang du bla ma'i lA
116a6('dul ba): bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo // zhes mchi'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i bsam pa la zhugs te ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad
116a7('dul ba): yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las snyam na bdag kho na la'o snyam nas/ des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis
116a8('dul ba): de bzhin du bgyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der bla ma'i las byed par brtsams pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus ldag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams la
116b1('dul ba): byed du gzhug par brtsam so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de rnams kyis gdul ba'i dus shes nas/ de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa de de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnam
116b2('dul ba): kyis bsams pa dben pa na 'dug pas/ 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/ de rnams kyi drung du song ste bskor nas 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus bsams pa 'di
116b3('dul ba): rnams bsams pa ji 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ong snyam nas bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas/ des lhag thogs sprul pa de spad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes
116b4('dul ba): zag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu yongs su skyab du gsol/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri shig ngal song chug shig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/
116b5('dul ba): 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di bsad par bsams pa na/ 'di bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to// de nas tshe
116b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsams pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
116b7('dul ba): bshang bar bye te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te de/
116b8('dul ba): rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/
117a1('dul ba): bdag cag btsun pa sha ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par sbyang bar bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus de rnams rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas
117a2('dul ba): nas gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyi brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo tshe lnga pa g.yo bo dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
117a3('dul ba): cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon gsum du byas
117a4('dul ba): te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa// na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'tshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang
117a5('dul ba): ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang snyed pa la chags pa dang bkur
117a6('dul ba): sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus
117a7('dul ba): gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'dzum pa 'byung bar brtsams so// khyim bdag
117a8('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis spras pa/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyan thos ni rgyu dang rkyen kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim
117a9('dul ba): mtha' gcig nas
117b1('dul ba): bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med chen med par 'dzub pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyi 'dir thig
117b2('dul ba): bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes mig bgrad de sbas pa/ 'phags pa sha
117b3('dul ba): ri'i bu gal te de lta na/ de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus thig rgud bzung ba dang /
117b4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par de'i 'jug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas
117b5('dul ba): bar gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen
117b6('dul ba): po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig du bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/
117b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na/ shul se ji tsam
117b8('dul ba): du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji tsam mo// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i bar gyi tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur
118a1('dul ba): ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma cig gis rgyang grags bcu zer cig gis rgyang grags bcu zer cig gi lam du 'gro'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan
118a2('dul ba): yod nas rgyal bu'i khab de'i bar du gshegs dgongs rtsis nas/ zhes dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag rtsig tu bcug/ gdugs tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs
118a3('dul ba): dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan dan gyis chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i bog por dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug/ dus kyi dang thun chod kyi sran kyang
118a4('dul ba): 'jog du bcug go/ de ltar tshogs pa bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song ba dang / kho bo'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan
118a5('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam 'tsho 'am skyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg pa gnas sam/ zhes zhus la 'di skad
118a6('dul ba): ces bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid mtsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod
118a7('dul ba): snyoms dang gzims ca dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sran gyi yo byang rnams kyis bsnyen bkur babyed do// zhes kyang gsol cig ngo ba bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des kyim bdag mgon med pa
118a8('dul ba): sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der ches te/ rims kyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin to// de nas lam gyis dub ba ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
118b1('dul ba): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
118b2('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mi khyod dang khyim
118b3('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
118b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ji srid mtsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang / snyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti bgying
118b5('dul ba): doHzhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
118b6('dul ba): nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba lci ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra
118b7('dul ba): bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu glang po che'i
118b8('dul ba): mchog glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ na ma khwa
119a1('dul ba): lding bya tshoms kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyi bskor ba la bu/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor bas grwa zla brgya gang gi tshogs kyi/
119a2('dul ba): kor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor bsrung dri ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la bu/ 'phags skyes po rdul bus kyis tshogs kyis bskor ba la bu/
119a3('dul ba): 'amig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ gnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyis tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin
119a4('dul ba): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa
119a5('dul ba): dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ skra skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
119a6('dul ba): bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ ri bo che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu
119a7('dul ba): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar banags pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po khyim bdag mgon med zas
119a8('dul ba): sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom
119b1('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi ske'i theb pa la zhabs g.yas pa mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnams pa drug du g.yos par
119b2('dul ba): gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu sdig ste/ shar phyogs mtho nanab phyogs dma'// nub phyogs mtho na/ shar
119b3('dul ba): phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur cing / 'jig rten
119b4('dul ba): 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te/ snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lha'i rnga brdang zhing na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng
119b5('dul ba): nas lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsun dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi bye ma dang /
119b6('dul ba): ta ma la'i lo mo'i bye ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba rnams 'bor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang la
119b7('dul ba): mtshan de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to// mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to// glang po che
119b8('dul ba): yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to// khyim na yod pa'i rol mo cha spyad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to// long ba rnams kyis mig
120a1('dul ba): 'thob bo// 'on pa rnams kyis rnabs thos so// tugs pa rnams ni sba nus par gyur/ dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams chang bar thob go//
120a2('dul ba): chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun 'khon byang ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to// sbram ma rnams ni bde bar
120a3('dul ba): btsas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las thar to// nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to// de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gsheg
120a4('dul ba): ba na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkar sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so// gshegs nas kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun gi gung
120a5('dul ba): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhags so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin 'dza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas/ gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/
120a6('dul ba): chu'i rgyun bsgreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'jug du ma btub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang / bcas pa cung
120a7('dul ba): zang byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med de/ 'on kyang khyod
120a8('dul ba): kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis/ phyogs gzhan zhig du 'dug la sbrengs shig/ des phyogs
120b1('dul ba): gzhan zhig du 'dag nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par/
120b2('dul ba): mdzad pa na/ gnon nu rgyal byed kyi bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar sros kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis
120b3('dul ba): gzhon na rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyang byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming theg mar spos pa mdzad do// gzhan
120b4('dul ba): na rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gis ming thog mar smos par mdzad pa thos nas/ shin du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor kyi rigs las
120b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi sgo gang byed du bcug go// de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
120b6('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// zhes gdams pa byas so// ko sa li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
120b7('dul ba): ba dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan go'u t+yas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
120b8('dul ba): pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis mche zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig
121a1('dul ba): mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po
121a2('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u tam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
121a3('dul ba): par bdag nyid zhal gyis mche'o zhes thos lags na/ go'u ma gang dag de skad ces lung stan pa de dag cig dge sbyong ko'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar
121a4('dul ba): spras pa ma lags sam/ shes ldan ko'u ta mas gsungs pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ cig de
121a5('dul ba): dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod par rjes su rtsod pa mchis na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad smra ba de dag ni
121a6('dul ba): de skad lung snyan pa bden te/ nga la skur ba 'debs pa yin/ thal bar sla bas yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag
121a7('dul ba): gi drung du ba rol po dang chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsad pa'i rjes su rjod pa 'ongs nas spong ba'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang
121a8('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan ko'u ta ma de skad gsung mod kyi/ shes ldan kor ta ma la bdag yid mchis lags so// de ci'i slad
121b1('dul ba): duzhe na/ kye ko'u ta ma re shig nan ning nan par dge slong dang tham ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byad dang / kun tu rgyug gnag lus kyi bu dang / sgra 'dod kyi ga
121b2('dul ba): me'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'bam skra'i la ba can dang / ka ta ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang / da dung bla na med pa yang dag par
121b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyi me mtshe lag na/ shes ldan ko& ta ma 'khrungs nas ring por ma lags gsar du rab tu byung
121b4('dul ba): bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon na bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/ gzhi gang zhe na rgyal po chen po rgyal
121b5('dul ba): rigs gzhon nu la khyad du bsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon na la zil gyis mnan
121b6('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po me chu ngu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chu pa la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon na la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu
121b7('dul ba): la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
121b8('dul ba): bka' stsal nas ni bde bar gshegs kyis de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/ rgyal rigs dpe dpyad ldan pa dang / rigs btsun grags
122a1('dul ba): par ldan pa la/ blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes/ khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan/ rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis/ rgyal srid dag ni thob
122a2('dul ba): gyur nas// chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod// de bas de ni shin du bdad// de ltar rang gi srog srung shig/ rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi bsad cing // de la
122a3('dul ba): legs par bag kyang bya// gal te grong ngam dgon pa 'am rung // ga da sbrul ni mthong gyur na// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes// khyad du mi bsad zil mi mnan// 'di ltar
122a4('dul ba): sbrul ni rgyu ba na// rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la// glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nas kyang // skyes pa bud med du ma zin// de ltar rang gi sreg srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas
122a5('dul ba): niHde ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// mang po sreg cing 'bar byed pa// lam nas bsreg bya za ba'i mi// blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes// khyad du mi gsad
122a6('dul ba): zil mi mnan// me ni chung ngu gyur pa yang // rkyen las chen por 'gyur ba yin// mes ni ring por me thogs par// grong rdal dang ni grong khyer sreg/ de ltar rang gi srog srung
122a7('dul ba): zhing // rang gi don la lta bas na// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing / de la legs par bag kyang bya// lam gnas sreg bya ba'i mes// nags tshal sreg pa gang yin te// zhag 'das
122a8('dul ba): nas ni 'ga' zhig du// 'dab ma rnams ni rkye 'gyur gyi// dge slong tshul khrim ldan pa la// brten gang zhig tshig gyur pa// de la bu tsha yod min pas// bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi
122b1('dul ba): 'gyur// ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin// ring po mi thogs rabs kyang 'chad// de bas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs
122b2('dul ba): par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang // de bzhin zang 'gro me dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la// blo dang ldan pas brnyes mi bya// de bas rang gi srog srung zhing //
122b3('dul ba): de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yid rang
122b4('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
122b5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kan dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bkur ba/ lha dges pa skyed du gsol/ khyod kyi
122b6('dul ba): sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do// zhes bsring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas/ pho nya btang ba lhags te de nyid rab tu byung ngo // gnyis pa
122b7('dul ba): gtang ba dang de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byang bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang /
122b8('dul ba): ma lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid du rab tu byung ngo // snyam nas sems khongs su chud
123a1('dul ba): cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal btad nas thugs mi dges shing bzhugs des smras pa/ 'char ka
123a2('dul ba): gang gi tshe gzhon nu thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i btang ba las/ de dag kho ba'i gam du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
123a3('dul ba): bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o// da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na dga' yang 'phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na/ ji ltar sems khongs su chud par mi
123a4('dul ba): 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas btsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa
123a5('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dag par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchi lags so//
123a6('dul ba): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyi spring yig bris pa lhums su zhags pa zung nas su/ khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal ba ljon
123a7('dul ba): shing la bsdad na// nga ni khyod kyis slob ma yin// yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar 'gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzhan
123a8('dul ba): yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun// bskrun te bu cig yul mis 'bras bus yongs su spyad thob na/
123b1('dul ba): de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na// nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni// shin tu tshe dang phan gdags shes// khyod kyi dam bcas mdzad
123b2('dul ba): nas ni/ khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na// bdag dang gnyen gyis tshogs rnams la// thugs brje rjes su bzung mdzod de// gshegs par dgongs par mdzad du gsol// zhes spring
123b3('dul ba): ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
123b4('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lags so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so// bklags nas yi ge mtha'
123b5('dul ba): gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhad dram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'char ka 'dong ngo // 'char ka sngon
123b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang / bdag gis mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung
123b7('dul ba): ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gi rgya mor ma chags shing / sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de//
123b8('dul ba): gzhi med na ni gang gis gzhi yi bkri/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya bor ma 'chags shing // phreng 'gags bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rtsal mnga'
124a1('dul ba): de/ gni med na ni gang gi gni yis bkri/ gang zhig bcom nas rtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa/
124a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gis bzhi yis bkri/ lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang
124a3('dul ba): ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags// rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang
124a4('dul ba): rab tu byang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar 'chi bar dam btsas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha rab tu byang la ji ltar
124a5('dul ba): dam bcas pa de bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ yab dang yum dang mkhan po dang slob dpon dang bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta
124a6('dul ba): bu rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go// 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na/ rab tu byung lags so// de nas bcom ldan
124a7('dul ba): 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'char ka 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
124a8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung / bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas te kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka
124b1('dul ba): 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o// zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan
124b2('dul ba): ba sha ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
124b3('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha song la
124b4('dul ba): khyod med kho nar rgyal po'i khab du ma 'jug par sgor sdod la sha kya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du byon gcig ces zer na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs
124b5('dul ba): na gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra na/ 'di 'dra
124b6('dul ba): zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab du yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab du gnas par
124b7('dul ba): mi byed dam zhes gleng na/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas pa byed ces 'dri na dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o//
124b8('dul ba): gal te gtsug lag khang ji 'dras zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bsten par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don grub pa byon nam zhes 'drin byon no//
125a1('dul ba): zhes brjod par bya'o// ji srid gcig na byon zhes 'dri na/ zhag bdun lon pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
125a2('dul ba): mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song shig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te// lha rnams bsam pas grub 'gyur zhing / de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnam
125a3('dul ba): kyi sems bskyed pas ni thams cad bsgrub// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i bzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis
125a4('dul ba): brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzad pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchi
125a5('dul ba): zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ji shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis
125a6('dul ba): so// rgyal pos smras pa nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char kha rab tu 'byung ngam/ des smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo // khyed
125a7('dul ba): slar 'ong ngo // zhes smras pa/ ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// zhes bka'
125a8('dul ba): stsal nas chos 'dul ba la legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thams cad 'khyud nas stan bsham
125b1('dul ba): pa nyid la 'dug du bcug ste/ de'i don du chu btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dal bar
125b2('dul ba): gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te spras pa/ 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams
125b3('dul ba): cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper na ji lta bu ri rab dang / yungs 'bru
125b4('dul ba): bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no// na mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis spras pa/ 'char kha gzhozhin
125b5('dul ba): na don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du
125b6('dul ba): btab nas dbugs slar byang ste smras pa/ 'char kha gzhon na don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha bad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'dir 'byon nam/ lha 'byon no// rgyal pos
125b7('dul ba): smras pa/ 'char ka dus nam zhig na 'byon/ lha gzhon nu dus ji srid cig na dgang bdun lon nas so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag
125b8('dul ba): gzhon du don thams cad grub pa 'byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal ba'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas spras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das ni/ pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do//
126a1('dul ba): rgyal po spras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas sbas pa/ dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang
126a2('dul ba): ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris bstan to// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra
126a3('dul ba): bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu brtsig du chug shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon pa rnams kyis rgyal po
126a4('dul ba): zas gtsang las mnyan nas/ n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig du bcug go/ de nas bcom
126a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ mo'u dgal gi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ mo'u dgal gi bu song la dge slong
126a6('dul ba): rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das ser skye'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan shom na/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgos shig/ btsun pa
126a7('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnas la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i bzhir
126a8('dul ba): gshegs te/ yab sras bdan bshom na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de/ chos gos dag long shig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor
126b1('dul ba): zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs 'byin pa/ 'khor dbugs 'byin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
126b2('dul ba): 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po tshe glang po'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ser
126b3('dul ba): ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang ba'i rgyal po ngang pany+tsi kyis bskor ba lta bu/ na mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
126b4('dul ba): lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu lam mkha' 'gro ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i
126b5('dul ba): tshogs kyi skor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta
126b6('dul ba): bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i
126b7('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor blta ba/ gnan gyi bu gnod sbyin gyis tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ thags pang ris lha ma yin gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs
126b8('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bams pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang
127a1('dul ba): / po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad byas bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas
127a2('dul ba): ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ba'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa dran
127a3('dul ba): ba nye bar bzhags pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad
127a4('dul ba): grub pa 'bab chu ro hi kar byon te zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang ka seg ma gsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/
127a5('dul ba): dri shin tu zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'chang mang po sbyangs/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas gang yang n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par
127a6('dul ba): byas te/ sa phyogs langs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkram pa dag bshom du bcug go// de nas 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khrug par byed do// kha cig ni so shing
127a7('dul ba): 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi
127a8('dul ba): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyis zhabs phyag bya
127b1('dul ba): lta'o snyam mo// // 'dul ba bzhi// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te gal te zhabs kyis ser skya'i bzhir gshegs na/ shAkya nga rgyal can
127b2('dul ba): rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas/ bka' thub gyi nags su gshegs nas ldog pa zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas/ steng gi nam
127b3('dul ba): mkha' las gshegs te/ des de srid du bka' ba brgya stong spyod pas bdud rtsi thogs nas nga zhabs kyi gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
127b4('dul ba): ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnams pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang bzhengs pa dang bzhugs pa dang /
127b5('dul ba): mnal ba mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs par bzhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'o/
127b6('dul ba): zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shes kyi kha dog dag go tshe 'phrul zung du yang ston par
127b7('dul ba): mdzad de/ sku'i slad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stod la 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i slad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par
127b8('dul ba): mdzad nas/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta bar/ lho phyogs dang nub dang byang phyogasu yang de bzhin no// / phyogs
128a1('dul ba): bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te/ ta la'i bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams ni
128a2('dul ba): ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam mo// bcom
128a3('dul ba): ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das
128a4('dul ba): gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams ta la cig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun srid tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// /
128a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das
128a6('dul ba): bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis
128a7('dul ba): kyi srid tsa ba na ni/ dge slong rnabs mi gang lhag tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong rnams lta'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang mang po mthong
128a8('dul ba): nas de la/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod/
128b1('dul ba): de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das stan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags so// srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/
128b2('dul ba): 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyid byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/ de'i ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes rtogs pa bcu mnga' kun gi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med brtsal
128b3('dul ba): ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang nga gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btung nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigasu bcad pas gsol pa// blo gros
128b4('dul ba): yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun spyad zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang // 'jam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya mo rnams
128b5('dul ba): kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud pa mthong nas da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa skyed do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
128b6('dul ba): shakya dang shakya mo rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces so// shes ldan da gdong kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzho
128b7('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos stsal par gyur te/ 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gi bar gyi
128b8('dul ba): mun pa mun nag du gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang bas nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos
129a1('dul ba): stsal bar gyur nas der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag cig mthong nas shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/
129a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos sems pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad
129a3('dul ba): grub pa/ zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na shing 'dam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dben pa rtogs pa dang
129a4('dul ba): bcas spyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po sgrubs te bzhugs pa ni shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni/
129a5('dul ba): shar phyogs su gzhol shar phyogs su 'bab shar phyogs su bab kyang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe/ yab ngo mtshar smad du
129a6('dul ba): byung ba'i chos des/ kho bo'i yid bsdus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas na 'di skad ces so//
129a7('dul ba): blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ kun spyad zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'i/ zhes smras so//
129a8('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de rtul nas/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid
129b1('dul ba): la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang
129b2('dul ba): gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnamasu// ji lta bu ni babs zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi yi
129b3('dul ba): bdag po gang du ni// khyim gyi bcing ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcu// thab pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa// ba go gser gyi rtsa ba can/
129b4('dul ba): shin tu bde ba gting ba yi// khri la mnal ba mdzad pa las// gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po rnams grol gnas pa la ni// dag
129b5('dul ba): ba byang chub yan lag gis// me tog bkram pa chag med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba// dga' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ gser dngu
129b6('dul ba): bum pas khrus mdzad na// rnyog pa can la dro ba yis// chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// go'u ta ma dang pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa
129b7('dul ba): med// bsod napas 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rigs pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
129b8('dul ba): gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi// tsan dan gyis ni sku bskus shing // ka shi mchog gnas mdzes pa'i lus/ de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das
130a1('dul ba): kyis dka' stsal pa// tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te// tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya/ rgyal
130a2('dul ba): pos gsol pa// dga' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das
130a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa// nga'i shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang // yang dag bcol ba bzhol ba yis/ sa kun rnam par rgyun yang / nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang
130a4('dul ba): gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i// na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las/ ngur mig btsub pa'i gos mnabs pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod/ bcom ldan 'das
130a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po dgos ngo tsha shes/ nga'i bgo ba snam sbyar te/ de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
130a6('dul ba): gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod ston gser gyis gzhong pa nas/ du ma'i ro ldan 'bras can gsol ba las/ 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod nams ni/ ngal pa gsol ba ji ltar
130a7('dul ba): ma gung mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ nges par 'byung dang mnyam par gzhag ldan pa'i/ nga ni chos kyi ro mchog
130a8('dul ba): gsol mod kyis/ 'jig rten kun la snying brtse phyir spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gi gsol pa/ mabur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol pa/
130b1('dul ba): rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i/ chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang thungs pa/ bdag la mthun pa thams cad ni/ dug dang 'dra bar snang
130b2('dul ba): gyur pa/ chos kyis ro mchog nga thung ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gsil khang gzhal med khang / khang bzangs steng na/ ji lta'i dus bzhin
130b3('dul ba): bzhugs pa la/ bla bzangs ji ltar snyengs pa med par bzhags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin te/ dri ma bag chags bcas par
130b4('dul ba): ngas spangs pas/ nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/ nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin du yid 'ong bas/
130b5('dul ba): khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil nas/ cig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
130b6('dul ba): stsal pa/ go'u ta ma chos kyis mtsho bran dri med pa/ tshul khrims 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus nas/ lus mi gsher bar pha rol
130b7('dul ba): rab tu rgal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gi khyod ni khyad du gsod/ gang las 'jigs su rung ba ste/ yid 'byung ba yang gang las skyes/ zhus pa de dag bdag
130b8('dul ba): la gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga ni khyad gsad dang / gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig khyod
131a1('dul ba): la bshad par bya/ rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ gal te 'di gsum 'ongs pa'i/ yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa//
131a2('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyis rigs dga' ba/ legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo lags/ khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ ji lta bur yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas
131a3('dul ba): byas nas/ drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtogs shing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas
131a4('dul ba): gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu/ thob pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu
131a5('dul ba): gro ta'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas// de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad mdzad de de thos pas zas dkar
131a6('dul ba): la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma rtogs so// lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa
131a7('dul ba): 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ khro ba'i kun nas bkrid pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par na/ bdag gis
131a8('dul ba): kyang 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bya ba zhig de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces zlog
131b1('dul ba): nas/ cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ des thos par rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sog
131b2('dul ba): shAkya bdun khri bdun stong rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas na yang lha sbyid de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// ro hi ta'i skyed mo tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/
131b3('dul ba): de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na/ lha sbyin de khe
131b4('dul ba): na bzhin du kha zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gi ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu kha cig gis bla na med
131b5('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni lan cis
131b6('dul ba): phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
131b7('dul ba): kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ chos la 'bab pa/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas
131b8('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang / brjod pa dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/
132a1('dul ba): da lta ni mis mchod kyis lhas ni ma yin no snyam po de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po sgras mchog dam chos kyis/ char pas
132a2('dul ba): 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzod de/ mi zad lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drang srong thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' shig 'di
132a3('dul ba): ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' bas pas bden pa ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis ci'i
132a4('dul ba): phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis bu 'ba' shig/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam te/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis 'dor
132a5('dul ba): na de'i dregs pa spong du bzhug go/ rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang shin du dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin du dga' ba yod
132a6('dul ba): kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du bzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/
132a7('dul ba): me'u 'gal gi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po
132a8('dul ba): zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'ag
132b1('dul ba): gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur sgron me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bdan bshams
132b2('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stad bshams pa nyid la 'dug go de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar mnyam par
132b3('dul ba): bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / 'greng
132b4('dul ba): ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bar zhugs par na tshe dang ldan pa me'u
132b5('dul ba): 'gal gyi bu chen po lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha
132b6('dul ba): dog dag go/ cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyis smad nas me 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang me'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyis stod nas mi
132b7('dul ba): 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyis smad nas chu grang me'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang
132b8('dul ba): byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi stan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par 'du bya ba smras te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// de nas
133a1('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po// bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan
133a2('dul ba): thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshig su bcad de smras pa// mthu che ba dang gsum rigs dang // sems kyi
133a3('dul ba): rnam grangs shes pa dang // gang zag dgra bcom gang yin pa// thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' shig 'di ltar
133a4('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/ de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//
133a5('dul ba): skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na lha'i 'khor dag la chos bshad do snyam pa dang /
133a6('dul ba): chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis
133a7('dul ba): dgongs pa shes par gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs kyis lha spos kyang ci dgos/ gang gis tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams
133a8('dul ba): kyi kyang sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta
133b1('dul ba): ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs skyed pa mdzad snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa/
133b2('dul ba): rnams chos 'chad pa bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad la bsgo ba bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par gzhed kyis/ n+ya gro de'i
133b3('dul ba): kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma ba dan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzung ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha rnams kyis
133b4('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma ba dan sna tshogs bsham pa shig sprul to// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi nas
133b5('dul ba): 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar phyogs sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong / dpung rgyan sna cha bdu ba 'khor dang /
133b6('dul ba): phreng ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/
133b7('dul ba): byang phyogs na ni lus ngan pa'o// rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar che thang du brgyad du bcug ste/ bcom ldan
133b8('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la daning rgyas par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lta brgya stong phrag dru bas
134a1('dul ba): yongs su bskor nas/ khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor bal po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan
134a2('dul ba): ba me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyis bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang
134a3('dul ba): la rgyal po yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug
134a4('dul ba): du mi dbang ngo // bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgya po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mtho
134a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag
134a6('dul ba): ni 'phags skyes pa'o// ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang /
134a7('dul ba): rgyal po mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo // ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug du mi dbang /
134a8('dul ba): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis spras
134b1('dul ba): ga bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig / rnam thos kyis bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bum ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir/
134b2('dul ba): gyur pa 'jug du mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gcad kye pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad ba de bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas/
134b3('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gi zhum pa'i rgyun gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te ma mthong na/ khrag dron mo skyugs/
134b4('dul ba): nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang
134b5('dul ba): yin pa de shel las byas pa sprul pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrib pa med pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
134b6('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang /
134b7('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu tshangs chos bshad pa mdzad de/ des thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
134b8('dul ba): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du cheng du brjod/
135a1('dul ba): pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis/ mas ma bgyis lags rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyi ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams
135a2('dul ba): kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi ma lags/ sdug pa dang rang gis skye bo dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
135a3('dul ba): la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gis sgo rnams ni bskum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag dang lha dang
135a4('dul ba): mi rnams bzhag go/ yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ dam pa'i bu ni bgyi ba gang / khyod kyi bdag la mdzad lags te/ sems ni grol bar bzhol bar bgyis/
135a5('dul ba): khyod kyi bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ drangs te mthe ris thar pa la/ bsgrim mi 'tshal bar gzhag lags te/ khyod kyi dka' ba mdzad pa lags// mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni/
135a6('dul ba): bdag ni tshangs pa rnyed ldan ltar/ mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi/ longs spyod dge ni ring bar mdzad/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/
135a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang
135a8('dul ba): bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas snang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang /
135b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ zas dkar/
135b2('dul ba): la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu khyod rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig/ ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so// gang gi gdugs la
135b3('dul ba): lags ste/ de ring kho na'o// bdag gi kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma shAkya bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags ste/
135b4('dul ba): de bzhin ze bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mo tshal du chos bshad pa de'i
135b5('dul ba): tshe shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom
135b6('dul ba): ldan 'das ro hi ta ka'i skyed mo tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so// gal te de ltar gyur na/ de su zhig rgyal srid la
135b7('dul ba): bzhag de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi bgyi'o// zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro// de nas
135b8('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyis metshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ bdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snong
136a1('dul ba): bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus chod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod lags na/ da de'i dus la babs sa
136a2('dul ba): par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bca' shapa thabs pan pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge
136a3('dul ba): 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bad na bsham pa nyid la bzhugs so//
136a4('dul ba): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gis dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gis lag
136a5('dul ba): nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gis lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grang du mar gtsang zhing
136a6('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas gser
136a7('dul ba): gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/
136a8('dul ba): sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa 'dis/ shAkya rnams kyis som pa yi/ yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni/ rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi
136b1('dul ba): / shing dra gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser sna'i gzhi shing cu gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes/
136b2('dul ba): gdags pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid la bzhugs nas/ nyi ma cig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol/
136b3('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral btsun las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dpa' yin na/ dka' thub drag po'i rdul shugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdung
136b4('dul ba): bas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na/
136b5('dul ba): 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa nas/ de bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas de nas shAkya thams cad sogs ste smras pa/
136b6('dul ba): shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na cir gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yogs
136b7('dul ba): bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyis rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yogs mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngag rab tu/
136b8('dul ba): byung shig ci thams cad dam khyim re re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul/
137a1('dul ba): @#/ na gnas pa'i shAkya'i rnams kyis khyim re re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces de skad bka' stsal to// ze bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming /
137a2('dul ba): chen no// ming chen ni zhing las kyis mtha' la lhag par brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs gi bzhi la 'dag nas skyes pa med pa'i ro la rtse bar byed dga' mgur
137a3('dul ba): spyod par byed do// ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bskos khyod rab tu byung shig/ des
137a4('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu ma byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig/ bu bsod nams kyis dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la
137a5('dul ba): khyod mgran ma tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la bgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags mod/ de ring de la chung zad kyang ma bskur dang / ji bsod nams kyis dbang
137a6('dul ba): thang chen po lags sam/ ma lags mngon 'gyur ro// bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o// des stong pa rnge'u gis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos bkris ste rgya skegs la/
